body: Daeho or Nilo or whatever name you go by, gullible is one thing but ignorance is another thing all together! You don't just ask one of your adopted family member to teach you how to masturbate just because you got indirectly chucked when your adopted father returned home! What happened to your innocence that you had before your adopted mother approached you?! I just hope the sister is sane enough to tell him to either touch the grass or look up online. This is going out of control that it is, dattebayo.
Okay he is now going after the sister welp she looks like a sane person hopefully
This is one of the most mentally debilitating things I have ever read. Awful translation; where is this set, North Korea? 'Sex is bad guy thing'. At least it has decent art.
Nice Harem webtoon.  Can't wait to see the friend's sister join the fun :)
She should’ve told him to ejaculate by himself
I like this story for now, but that friend have a NTR kind of face....

This manhwa is amazing, just read it on toonily like guy previous mentioned. If you really like manhwa and you are new to it or not. I recommend you to join manhwa18.com and Pornhwa discords. You have everything there, good community and daily updated informations like raws, translated chapter, sums and many good users from scanalations, translations etc. are there.

This story is good but I need more. Please do more. And in English. Not all customers knowing other languages. Not all are brilliants. I mean if all are brilliants everyone can make comic no one ever reads. Everyone making ego on themselves.
That level of selfish ignorance is unacceptable, I want in*_*
